div.p:
Iter Camerarij inchoatum per alexandrum Narn et Johannem lummysden deputatos
Camerarij Scocie xv die februarij Anno domini jM iiijC xlviijo / quo die secta

Johannes buchane fatetur debere Johanni patricii de xvij s' et satisfaciet
infra terminum Juris pl' balliuj

div.head: Nomina assise
div.p:
gilbert meigneis / Ricardus de Ruthirfurde Johannes de marr' / Mathow fichet Johannes de scrogs filius
patricius de badienach John' Gray / Androw ancroft Robert Wormot Johne' howyson'
Will Rollande / John' henrisone Culane / Johne of Culane Johannes voket pater Robert
blyndsele Alexander Kyntor et Johannes Wode

Willelmus lammyngton' fatetur se debere seruare Johannem Kintor indempnem de vij lib' monete
pro quibus deuenit Duncano de clat plegius pro eodem Willelmo et cetera plegio

Robertus stephin tenetur satisfacere Willelmo lamynton' vnum sarpellarium in quo
ponebantur pelles infra terminum Juris plegio plen gilberto vaus

Willelmus voket deliberabit Roberto blyndseil vnam b bipennem argentata in proximis
nauibus venientibus de flandria sub periculo eiusdem Robertj vel valorem eiusdem bipennis
plegio
Robertus stephin satisfaciet ad fabricam ecclesie beati nicholai iiij s' g' infra terminum Juris plegio

solutus et quitus + Willelmus banerman tenetur satisfacere Jonete girkin v s' infra terminum Juris et si
maritus eiusdem Jonete non reveniat citare festum pentecostes proximo futuro dictus Willelmus
satisfaciet eedem Jonete Residuum v florenorum de Reno / plegio

Willelmus Voket satisfaciet gilberto laeng de j mensa j pari tripodorum et de xxxj d'
infra terminum Juris plegio de residuo quit'
Dauid Dun fatetur se debere Andree patrikson' ij marcas plegio Johanne Voket filio
Will moor' fatetur se debere Johanni de spens ix s' plegio
Johannes blyndseil fatetur se debere andree ayncroft v lib' infra terminum Juris plegio
Willelmus baxstar' fatetur se debere simoni blabre lij s' infra terminum Juris plegio andrea patrikson' plegio
Iter Camerarij
Johannes hervy fatetur se debere Alexandro galt ij s' et j graywerk plegio

Thomas cadiou satisfaciet Johanni rede carnifici ij s' et ipse deliberabit sibi cultellum suum
argentatum plegio .
Alexander blyndseil satisfaciet Dauid blabre de v s' infra terminum Juris plegio
Robertus stephin satisfaciet Johanni fichet de j hamburgh barella salmonum plegio
Johannes Wood faciet f satisfieri thome blyndseil de v markis marcis plegio
Johannes de scrogs filius faciet satisfieri sponse Willelmi maliceson' de xlij s' iiij d'
thomas nicholson' est quitus de calumpnia thome blyndseil de xlv s' g'

thomas blyndseil Johannes scrogs filius et ceteri consocij sui balliui eo tempore facient
satisfieri Willelmo andirson' de iiij lib' ix d' plegio
Johannes hervy faciet satisfieri sponse Willelmi maliceson de xxx d' plegio
Robertus de camera satisfaciet thome de marr' xiij s' iiij d' plegio gilberto masoune

Willelmus sprot est debitor et seruabit Willelmum cadiou indempnem de xxv s' g'
debito Edmundo lauson' plegio gilberto meignes
Andreas bell satisfaciet Johanni howison' de vj s' plegio Johanne Wod
Johannes Kynnore satisfaciet Angusio Johnson' de xx s' g' plegio

Robertus prat faciet computum infra terminum Juris cum angusio Johnson' de iiij lib' petitis
per eundem alias erit debitor tocius summe plegio georgio adamson' et thoma camera

Dauid mathison' deliberabit Willelmo voket bipennem Robertj blyndseil in flandria in
aduentu istarum nauium plegio Willelmo coly
Willelmus sprot satisfaciet Roberto scherar' j hamburgh barellam salmonum plegio gilberto meignes

Alexander galt faciet computum et soluciones Johanni hervy de v lib' cum de pewder
et xij vlnis albi panni plegio se ipso
gilbert mason' satisfaciet Johanni scrogis patri j hamburgh barellam salmonum plegio roberto camera
Johannes de spens satisfaciet Willelmo more xv s' plegio
gilbertus mason' satisfaciet domino Johanne pettynwyne xij s' plegio

Item Thomas Androuson' chawmer fatetur se debere Thome Androuson'
iiij s' ij d' et satisfaciet infra terminum Juris plegio Roberto prat
Andreas Dauidson' fatetur se debere thome cadiou de iij s' vj d' plegio
Andreas tulidef fatetur se debere Johanni nachti xv s' plegio
Johannes de spens et alexander andirson satisfaciet thome Duncaneson' ij s' plegio
accordit Johannes Wood satisfaciet Willelmo bur

Robertus Wormot deliberabit Johanni howison' cooportorium ciphi argenteum et ipse soluet
sibi xxx s' plegio
Johannes Kynnore soluet Dauid blabre x s' g' flandrie plegio

Robertus Wormote restituet andree alaneson' vnam taciam argentj et ipse soluet sibi
xt xl s' plegio

Ricardus de camera seruabit Johannem de scrogs indempnem de xlij s' iiij d' debitis
sponse Willelmi maliceson infra terminum Juris plegio
Johannes de spens soluet Andree de fife x s' pro vno plegio

Duncanus de clat et magister Ricardus de forbes arbitri electi in causa infrascripta / s
declarabunt et deliberari facient Jacobo Kintor vtensilia spectan' ad eum tanquam heredem
quondam Johannis thomson' / infra xl dies si dictus magister Ricardus medio tempore
reveniat / sin autem balliui facient post lapsum dicti termini huiusmodi vtensilia
deliberari . et cetera

Maistir John' of cadyou grantis that he borrowit a hors fra Robin
scherar the quhilk hors the said maistir lent to R Rechart
of Kyntor
Andreas Duncaneson' soluet angusio Johnson' iiij s' g' flandrie plegio

Johannes crukschank soluet Johanni loudoune xx s' recepta obligatione Andree nase nisi
poterit probare solucionem dicte summe plegio

Actio mariorie scherar' aduersus Robertum Williamson' de iij lib' xv s' refertur declaracioni
seriendi constabularij et cetera

Johannes loudoune satisfaciet Johanni crukschank dampna que possit probare se sustinuisse
in orto suo in defectu dicti Johannis loudoune
Johannes sanchar' satisfaciet andree alanesone' j hamburgh barellam salmonum plegio gilberto sanchar
Johannes Wod soluet Johanni howison' xvj s' plegio
Andreas alaneson' soluet Johanni sanchar' xiiij s'

Johannes henrison' Junior soluet thome craufurd' xvij lib' v s' infra terminum Juris
plegiis Willelmo scherar' et Johanne blyndseil

Willelmus scherar' alias prepositus et balliui sui seruabunt Johannem de spens seriendem indempnem
de dictis x s' plegio
Iter Camerarij
Thomas nicholson' fatetur se debere thome blyndseil xxiij lib' plegio se ipso
Willelmus cadiou quitus de calumpnia Willelmi scherar' de xij elnis panni viridis et cetera

Assisa electa de consensu parcium infrascriptarum inter thomam blyndseil ex vna et
Johannem Wood partibus ex altera reperit determinauit et deliberauit matura deliberacione
auditis et consideratis alligacionibus vtriusque partis / quod prefatus thomas habet verum
Jus in et ad quendam annuum redditum xiiij s' debit' annuatim de quadam terra Johannis
Wood predicti Jacente in vico furcarum ex parte orientali eiusdem inter terram que fuit quondam
patricij lang ex parte australi et terram hered' quondam Johannis bertlotson' ex parte
boreali / et hoc per vendicionem Willelmi fichet filij et hered' quondam Ricardi fichet
Et quod

A Dauid Dun re fatetur quod restituet mariote beton' vnum anulum aureum Juris infra
terminum Juris plegio macolmo forbes

Macolmus forbes dedit Willelmum scherar' plegium legalem quod Johannes Kymedy et pars
sua tota erunt indempnes de eo et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris
Dauid Dun dedit eundem macolmum forbes plegium quod dictus Johannes Kymedy et cetera vt supra

Johannes Kymedy dedit Duncanum clat plegium vt supra quod dicti macolmus et Dauid erunt
indempnes vt supra

Actio mota inter Willelmum scherar' et andream alaneson' per assisam ponitur in dilacione
usque aduentum magistri alexandri guthery / et tunc prepositus et balliuj facient dictam
actionem finiri

Assisa reperit et declarauit quod actio mota e inter thomam andirson' ex vna et Adam
Relictam quondam andree Johnson' sororem suam partibus ex altera penes certa bona et
res que et quas petit' ab eadem per dictum thomam sibi vt asserit Jure hereditario
contingen' / fuit ali ab antea et est per certos arbitros inter easdem partes concordit'
electus finita et s determinata
Johannes gray soluet domine margarete Stewarte xxx s' x d' plegio
Andreas gibson' soluet alexandro galt x s' viij d' et ix' plegio
Willelmus stradee soluet mariote sprunt ix s' plegio
Willelmus atkynson' soluet Johanni howyson' vj s' vj d' plegio

Willelmus catenas' deliberabit stephani Johnson' debitorem suum infra burgum et stephanus
balrony prosequetur Jus suum donec debitor reperiatur non soluendo / et tunc
dictus Willelmus catenas' erit debito de ij hamburgh barella et ij duodenis salmonum
Iter Camerarie

Memorandum that the balyheis of eer'farnyher' and farnyher' sal apon friday next
tocum that is to say the xxvij of februar' next tocum be viij houris befor
none sal compeir' in the tolbuth' of this burgh' and deliuer In thair'
acomptis of thir' twa yheris bigane and vndirly the determinacion of
thir' auditouris vndirwrittin / that is to say / Duncane of clat dene of gild
John of marr' / matheu fichet / Alexander of Kintor / and patrik badenach / and
give thar' beis in thair' acomptis ony grete weris or doutis / thai sal
referr' that to be endit be the hale counsaile

Item it is ordanit that ix or x of the best of the toune sal pass' with' aparte
of the gangand assis' and see the venales and othiris fautis and purpris'
of the toune / and quhar' thai' fynd purpris' marke it and put it in writ and
chardge thaim to refourme it within xl daijs / and forborne vndir payne
of purprisioune of the king / and thir' persounes to be chosin be the Aldirman
and balyheis

Item the housis that ar fundin vnsufficient be the assis' sal be refourmyt be
thaim at aw thaim within viij daijs or ellis the balyheis sal pass' and tak
doune the durris and wyndowis of thaim and mak thaim vninhabitabile

Item it is avisit and concludit be the counsaile / anence the payment of the
Rest' of the ald fynance / that the quhilk extendis be appoyntment to
ijC lib' / that al soumes writtin in the Roll' bath' recouirabile and vnrecouirabile
be sowmyt be punde gretis / and ilke punde grete be put til a certane soume
of Scottis payment eftir as it may extend to pay the said ijC lib' / and
than ilke man that is awand recouirabile sal pay eftir that tax / and than
it at remanys vnrecouirabile of the said ijC lib' sal be paijt be the hale toun
eftir the avis' and sight of the Counsaile

Dehinc fuerunt deputatj camerarij Johannes de fife gilbertus meignes et Johannes scrogs filius pater Johannes spens seriendus obligatur satisfacere Jonete quhite de precio mantelli sui infra terminj Juris

Dauid hervy erit debitor thome Kintor et Dauid symson' de ly lottyng quam pertinet
ad eum sicut ceteri consocij plegio macolmo forbes
Alexander modane soluet gilberto mason' x s' infra terminum Juris plegio

p.del: Andreas childe satisfaciet Johanni sanchar' xliiij s' g' / et pro residuo

div.p:
Ricardus de camera dedit gilbertum meignes plegium quod comparebit coram communi consilio huius
burgi et subiet calumpniam et decretum eiusdem penes perturbacionem alexandri
andirson seriendi et cetera
Iter Camerarie

Ricardus de camera
Jacobus cummyng ex vna et Ricardus de camera partibus ex altera penes omnes debatas motas
inter eosdem submiserunt se gilberto meignes Johanni de scrogs patri Duncano clat et
Johanni gray finiendum citra dominicam in passione Domini proximo futuro / et dictus Ricardus dedit
macolmum forbes plegium quo satisfaciet dicto Jacobo quantum eidem per dictos arbitros condempnatus
debere condempnatus fuerit et cetera

Dauid Dun nauta conuictus per assisam in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione andree
broysour' et emendabit partj lese ad visum proborum virorum / et dedit Johanni scrogs filio
plegium legalem quod dictus andreas erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris

Et dictus andreas fuit quitus factus per eandem assisam de dicta perturbacione et dedit
angusium lilburn plegium legalem vt supra

Andreas broisour' D soluet Duncano Aloune iij vlnas canubij et Dauid Dun soluet
alios iij vlnas canubij
Johannes marr' bet quitus per assisam de calumpnia henrici banerman de iiij lib' grossorum petitis per eum
henricus banerman seruabit Willelmum hervy indempnem de plegiagio xiiij s' plegio
Johannes Kynnore soluet Willelmo voket xiij s' ix g' plegio
Et dictus Willelmus petet Residuum calumpnie sue a Jacobo coupar
henricus banerman soluet patricio quhite vj s' plegio

Si thomas armydil non potest probare per certificationem Walteri clerk de monros' uel alterius
cuiuscumque quod emit a Jos' purs' vnam cimbam / erit debitor et satisfaciet Ricardo
Ruthirfurd' precium eiusdem cimbe / super quo idem Ricardum cepit manum suam in plegio
Johannes spens seriendus quitus per assisam de calumpnia simonis blabre de xl s' per carinage

Johannes de Kynnore reperitur debere Waltero giffard' de Rest' cuiusdam obligacionis sue
v s' viij g' monete flandrie soluendis infra terminum Juris / et portabit certificacione de
flandria quod vraw vouns' Jurauit quod non recepit nisi vnam barellam salmonum et cetera
Robertus balrony seruabit Willelmum sprot indempnem' de xxvj s' g' penes edmundum louson'
thomas cadiou fatetur se debere Roberto gillespi v s' infra terminum Juris plegio
Andreas marr' fatetur se debere Willelmo voket xviij s' infra terminum Juris plegio

dominusThis entry is linked to ARO-5-0035-19 through a line. Adam traile capellanus ex vna et Johannes traile partibus ex altera penes actiones certas
summas pecunie submiserunt se determinacioni thome blyndseil Johanni scrogs filio
matheo fichet et patricio badenach' / uel deficientibus aliquibus uel aliquo premissorum
alij uel alius in locum deficien' subrogetur

Alexander grahame soluet Willlemo atkynson' ij s' vj d' plegium et ipse Willelmus quitus
calumpnia dicti alexandri de xl s'

JohannesThis entry is linked to ARO-5-0035-17 through a line. traile prosecutus per dominum adam traile quod iniuste recepit ex detinet parte eiusdem domini
Ade et detinet xj lib' ij s' ij lib' g' / quietus factus fuit per assisam de iniusta
recepcione dictarum summarum / et desuper postea submiserunt se personis suprascriptis
Iter Camerarie
Andreas broisour' soluet Roberto balrony iiij s' pro vna barella separum plegio

Si Johannes patonson' pater probare quod quondam bos deductus per fyndelaum fleschar' ab homine
de rocharald fuit ipsius Johannis et sibi deliberatus fyndelaius predictus satisfaciet eidem
Johannem precium dicti bouis / uel alium daliberabitdeliberabit debitorem

Dauid Dun et Dauid hervy, thom quelp et Johannes traile, indictati et accusati de communi brigacione et perturbacione
infra burgum quieti facti fuerunt per assisam

Macolmus forbes Dauid Dun and Dauid hervy accusit of the disobeying of
Androw Alaneson' the balyhe that wald noght' fynd borowes of pes' quhen
he chargeit thaim denijt the disobeyng and swa it was put to ane
assis' that is to say A Androw tulidef Duncane of clat matheu fichet
Robert of chamer henry levington' Wat giffart Alexander blyndseil John scherar'
murthou glastre Dauid symson' androw ayncroft and William Rolland'
the quhilkis avisit Resplaitit this quhil thai f be forthir' avisit with'
men of law // and becaus' the said partie allegeit that thai suld noght'
fynd borowes bot give thair' partie wald swer' that thai doutit him
thaim / thai fynd that Ivil broght' vp / and thai will that it be nocht
allegeit in tyme tocum be ony man / vndir payne a that may folow

Dauid Ruthirfurd' in amerciamento curie pro iniusta p spoliacione nauis Dauid Dun de vno
Cable et Restituet idem cable

DauidThere is a manicular in the left margin, with a finger pointing to 'Dauid'. hervy predictus in amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi hervy et emendabit parti
lese ad visum proborum virorum plegio

Dauid Dun satisfaciet Waltero hervy xv s' vj d' infra terminum Juris nisi poterit
probare crastina die videlicet sexto die mensis marcij instantis quod sibi satisfecit
et in quam potest solutum probare defalcabitur et residuum soluet plegio

Dauid Ruthirfurd' dedit Robertum de camera plegium legalem pro eo et parte sua quod
macolmus de forbes Dauid Dun et Dauid hervy et partes sue erunt indempnes
aliter quam per viam Juris

Et dictus macolmus dedit Willelmum scherar' plegium legalem quod Dauid ruthirfurd'
erit indempnis vt supra et pars sua tota

Dauid Dun et Dauid hervy dederunt macolmum de forbes plegium legalem
quod dictus Dauid Ruthirfurd' et pars sa sua erunt indempnes vt supra

taxacio Itineris Camerarie facta per Duncanum clat Johannem de scrogs patrem et
patricium badenach'

Memorandum quod Duncanus de clat decanus gilde fatetur se recipisse
de quarterio de ly grene iiij lib' iij s' vj d'

Item dictus Duncanus recepit de quarterio de futy per alexandrum
andirson' seriendum iij lib' ij s' .

Item idem Duncanus fatetur se recipisse de ly evin quartar'
iiij lib' videlicet in vno xx s' et iij lib' satisfaciend' per
Andream Alaneson'

Item idem Duncanus fatetur se recipisse a Johanne Kintor
de ly crukit quartar' v lib' xiij s' xj d'
